header.summary:
[587] [smtp.gmail.com] GMail sender.
Note: go to https://myaccount.google.com/lesssecureapps and set "Allow less secure apps" to ON.

constructor.name: (string, string)
constructor.param: e-mail password or special e-mail password for applications.

header.summary:
[587] [smtp.mail.com] Mail sender.
Note: you do not have to do anything.

member.name: E:KamilSzymborski.MailSenders.Sender.Failed
member.summary: Failure. Raised only for asynchronous operations.

member.name: E:KamilSzymborski.MailSenders.Sender.Sended
member.summary: Success. Raised only for asynchronous operations.

member.name: M:KamilSzymborski.MailSenders.Sender.Send(System.String,System.String,KamilSzymborski.MailSenders.Attachment[])
member.summary: Sends the mail synchronously without a title.
member.param: message in plain text or html.

member.name: M:KamilSzymborski.MailSenders.Sender.Send(System.String,System.String,System.String,KamilSzymborski.MailSenders.Attachment[])
member.summary: Sends the mail synchronously with a title.
member.param: message in plain text or html.

member.name: M:KamilSzymborski.MailSenders.Sender.Send(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,KamilSzymborski.MailSenders.Attachment[])
member.summary: Sends the mail synchronously with a title and optionally with display name.
member.param: message in plain text or html.

[can be null] sender's name, for example: "Microsoft Corp.".
Note: may be ignored / overwritten by account settings.

member.name: M:KamilSzymborski.MailSenders.Sender.Send(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,KamilSzymborski.MailSenders.Attachment[])
member.summary: Sends the mail synchronously with a title and optionally with display name and replyer.
member.param: message in plain text or html.

[can be null] sender's name, for example: "Microsoft Corp.".
Note: may be ignored / overwritten by account settings.

[can be null] reply email address, for example: "no@reply.com".
Note: must be like an email address.

member.name: M:KamilSzymborski.MailSenders.Sender.Send(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{KamilSzymborski.MailSenders.Priority},KamilSzymborski.MailSenders.Attachment[])
member.summary: Sends the mail synchronously with a title and optionally with display name, replyer and priority.
member.param: message in plain text or html.

[can be null] sender's name, for example: "Microsoft Corp.".
Note: may be ignored / overwritten by account settings.

[can be null] reply email address, for example: "no@reply.com".
Note: must be like an email address.

[can be null] email priority.
Note: is not allowed / interpreted everywhere.

member.name: M:KamilSzymborski.MailSenders.Sender.SendAsync(System.String,System.String,KamilSzymborski.MailSenders.Attachment[])
member.summary: Sends the mail asynchronously without a title.
member.param: message in plain text or html.

member.name: M:KamilSzymborski.MailSenders.Sender.SendAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String,KamilSzymborski.MailSenders.Attachment[])
member.summary: Sends the mail asynchronously with a title.
member.param: message in plain text or html.

member.summary: Sends the mail asynchronously with a title and optionally with display name.
member.param: message in plain text or html.

[can be null] sender's name, for example: "Microsoft Corp.".
Note: may be ignored / overwritten by account settings.

member.param: message in plain text or html.

[can be null] sender's name, for example: "Microsoft Corp.".
Note: may be ignored / overwritten by account settings.

[can be null] reply email address, for example: "no@reply.com".
Note: must be like an email address.

member.name: M:KamilSzymborski.MailSenders.Sender.SendAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{KamilSzymborski.MailSenders.Priority},KamilSzymborski.MailSenders.Attachment[])
member.summary: Sends the mail asynchronously with a title and optionally with display name, replyer and priority.
member.param: message in plain text or html.

[can be null] sender's name, for example: "Microsoft Corp.".
Note: may be ignored / overwritten by account settings.

[can be null] reply email address, for example: "no@reply.com".
Note: must be like an email address.

[can be null] email priority.
Note: is not allowed / interpreted everywhere.
